entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 1:48 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %

Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
